author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

This PR introduces a new ALCARECO (`SiPixelCalSingleMuon`) to ease the monitoring work of the Pixel Offline group. Size of the ALCARECO dataset is 0.017 MB/event. 

#### PR validation:

The PR was validated with 
`cmsDriver.py -s RAW2DIGI,RECO,ALCA:SiPixelCalSingleMuon --conditions 110X_dataRun2_2017_2018_Candidate_2019_11_21_04_11_05 --eventcontent=ALCARECO --datatier ALCARECO -n 100 --no_exec --era Run2_2018 --python_filename=SingleMuon_2018_v1.py --nThreads=8 --filein=root://cms-xrd-global.cern.ch//store/data/Run2018C/SingleMuon/RAW/v1/000/320/191/00000/FEC2-FC5C-FE8D-E811-B559-FA163EF38B4B.root`

where the Candidate GT `110X_dataRun2_2017_2018_Candidate_2019_11_21_04_11_05` contains the tag `AlCaRecoTriggerBits_TestForPixelALCARECO_v2` that has the trigger bit that enables this ALCARECO. AlCaDB agreed to provide a proper GT later.

The usual pixel offline trees were produced with it and compared to the results based on RECO files. The outcome is identical and was presented at the AlCaDB meeting yesterday:
[https://indico.cern.ch/event/866816/#4-new-alcareco-for-pixel-offli](https://indico.cern.ch/event/866816/#4-new-alcareco-for-pixel-offli)
